mapper.sql: select f.id, fu.name fromUser, tu.name toUser, f.quantity, f.pay_medium payMedium, f.description, f.pay_time, f.created, f.updated
mapper.insert: insert into fund (from_user_id, to_user_id, quantity, description, pay_medium, pay_time) values (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{quantity}, #{description}, #{payMedium}, #{payTime})
mapper.update: update fund set from_user_id = #{fromUserId}, to_user_id = #{toUserId}, quantity = #{quantity}, description = #{description}, pay_medium = #{payMedium}, pay_time = #{payTime}, updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
